0.1.name: wordpress/copyrights
0.1.description:
Author Site

KANKOD's copyrights plugins restricts visitors from copying your site contents, by disabling the common web copy methods, such as right clicking,text selection image dragging and more.

Keeping your content safe is becoming a real issue, content thieves scan the web to find intresting content (posts/images etc..). Kankod Copyrights will help you to secure your content and stay on-top of users trying to copy your content.

Key features:
-- [copyrightsThis] shortcode to enable plugin only in specific pages.
-- Protects your unique content from being stolen.
-- Ban right click.
-- Disable images dragging.
-- Ban right click context menu
-- Disable text selection
-- Disable CTRL-C
-- Disable copy-n-paste
-- Supported on Chrome,Firefox,Internet Explorer,Opera.

For more infor visit:
